dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
GluonCV provides implementations of state-of-the-art (SOTA) deep
learning algorithms in computer vision. It aims to help engineers,
researchers, and students quickly prototype products, validate new ideas
and learn computer vision.
dependent_to.name: py-gluoncv

dependent_to.description: A library for providing I/O abstraction.
dependent_to.name: py-iopath

dependent_to.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Extensions for Python offers secure
mechanisms for client applications to perform cross-platform token cache
serialization and persistence. It gives additional support to the
Microsoft Authentication Library for Python (MSAL).
dependent_to.name: py-msal-extensions

dependent_to.description:
SacreBLEU is a standard BLEU implementation that downloads and manages
WMT datasets, produces scores on detokenized outputs, and reports a
string encapsulating BLEU parameters, facilitating the production of
shareable, comparable BLEU scores.
dependent_to.name: py-sacrebleu

dependent_to.description: Composable data loading modules for PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-torchdata

description: Portalocker is a library to provide an easy API to file locking.
name: py-portalocker

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
